duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and execute large-scale K12 transformation via instructional design and software implementation.
Monitor progress on student learning outcomes, teacher learning outcomes, implementation journeys, and product engagement.
Work across teams to optimize onboarding process for school leaders and educators.
Collaborate with district team and data and learning science teams to manage, measure, and improve best practice materials for educators.
Ensure customer engagement and coordinate across departments to optimize usage, renewal, and expansion opportunities.
Manage user experience researchers throughout product development process.
Manage key metrics related to the implementation of all sales, marketing, and product implementations.
Leverage teams across the organization to drive user engagement and fidelity in adoption.
Support projects focused on identifying opportunities for growth and innovating processes for customer success organization.
Support fellow team members in their development and work together to provide the highest level of excellence in customer experience.

education_certification.credential: Doctorate degree in educational research or leadership (Master's preferred)
